workflows.summary: Search for a specific BBC programme (brand, series, episode, or clip) by title or keyword, retrieve its unique Programme Identifier (PID), and then fetch detailed information including its on-demand availability.

workflows.summary: Find a specific BBC TV or Radio service (channel) and retrieve its broadcast schedule for a given day.

workflows.summary: Navigate the structure of BBC programming by starting with a Brand (overall show), finding its associated Series, and then listing the Episodes within a chosen Series.

steps.description: Find a specific Brand by title or keyword.

workflows.description: Discover content currently being promoted by the BBC (e.g., featured on iPlayer), retrieve the list of promoted items, and then fetch details for those specific programmes.

steps.description: Get a list of currently active promotions, optionally filtering by the service they are promoted for.
Retrieve detailed information for the programmes identified in the promotions list.

workflows.summary: Search for a specific person (cast, crew, guest) and retrieve a list of BBC programmes they have contributed to.

steps.description: Search for a person by name to find their contributor PID.

workflows.summary: Find a specific curated group (like a season or collection) by its title or PID, and then list all the programmes included within that group.

steps.description: Search for a specific group (collection, season, etc.) by keyword or PID.

workflows.summary: Find a specific episode and then retrieve metadata about its internal segments, such as chapters or music tracks used within the programme.
